about_the_game:
Welcome to Waifu Builder- a relaxing puzzle game inspired by Model building(gunpla) but with just 100% waifus. You will experience the relaxing process of building a model kit with complete freedom.

Cut out, assemble, paint and customize your waifus in 9 different themes such as: gothic, maids, bikini, medieval fantasy, demons and more

Building all the waifu kits will take around 6-8 hours of your time.

Features

  • 61 waifu kits to build

  • 9 waifu themes

  • Total freedom to assemble the models

  • Customize them as you like

content_descriptors.notes: The game basically consists of assembling anime girl characters model kits. The models often contains revealing outfits.

Cut out, assemble, paint and customize your waifus in 9 different themes such as: gothic, maids, bikini, medieval fantasy, demons and more

name: Waifu Builder

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.66GHz (64 bit)
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 7770, GeForce GTX 460 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Requirements may change as development furthers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4570
  • Memory: 10 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 7770, GeForce GTX 460 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Requirements may change as development furthers

short_description: Welcome to Waifu Builder- a relaxing puzzle game inspired by Model building(gunpla) but with just 100% waifus. You will experience the relaxing process of building a model kit with complete freedom with over 61 waifus.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
